mapper.select: select * from ( select num,c_id,title,intro,type,goal,tool,frequency,price,img,count,rownum r from ( select * from tbl_coachclass order by num desc)) where r >= #{firstRownum} and r <= #{lastRownum}
select * from ( select review_num,class_num, id,nick,title,content, grade, rownum r from ( select * from tbl_review order by review_num desc)) where r >= #{firstRownum} and r <= #{lastRownum}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_coachclass(num, c_id, title, intro, type, goal, tool, frequency, price) values(seq_coachclass.nextval, #{c_id}, #{title}, #{intro}, #{type}, #{goal}, #{tool}, #{frequency}, #{price})
insert into tbl_review(review_num, class_num, id, nick, title, content, grade) values(seq_review.nextval, #{class_num}, #{id},#{nick},#{title},#{content},#{grade})
mapper.update: update tbl_coachclass set title=#{title}, intro=#{intro}, type=#{type}, goal=#{goal}, tool=#{tool}, frequency=#{frequency}, price=#{price} where num=#{num}
